name: Abducted - Elizas Quest
description:
In a mysterious night, Aliens abducted Elizas parents. They did not know that Eliza sneaked onto the UFO and hid between crates. These Aliens brought her to a different planet. Now Eliza needs to find a way to rescue her parents.

Follow Eliza on her Quest. Find the Keycard in each Chapter and stay out of sight of hungry Aliens and their Surveillance-technologies like cameras. Use the surrounding to avoid their eyes.

This Game is made for Angry Smiles Beginners Circle Jam #3

Everything made by myself using Unity (for Music i used Beepbox and i used Unitys Built-In Font) 

Controls ( Keys )w, a, s, dMovementeInteractSpaceJump
